title: Jennifer Walters
author: Jennifer Walters
content: So sad but not a shock any more    ripRapper PnB Rock shot to death amid robbery at LA Roscoe's Chicken & Waffles restauranthttps://www.dailymail.co.uk/tvshowbiz/article-11205113/Rapper-PnB-Rock-shot-death-amid-robbery-LA-Roscoes-Chicken-Waffles-restaurant.html

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Never heard of him myself to be honest but like you said OP, it’s not a surprise any more. It seems to come with the territory in that industry.Needless death, poor guy. I feel for the genuine people who love him that are left behind. May he RIP.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I believe it is truly sad what happen to the rapper PNB Rock, he was so young with a great future ahead of him. I was reading the news online, police said that the shooter demanded jewelry and other valuable items from the rapper. Witnesses inside the restaurant said that a struggle took place resulting in PNB Rock getting fatally shot multiple times. The shooter took a chain along with other things from the rapper bleeding on the floor, the shooter was able to flee from the scene. Investigators are still investigating whether the robbery was a targeted attack or a prompt attack.
